html:
According to cityam and proactiveinvestors, Spotify Technology SA (Spotify), a Luxembourg-based provider of audio streaming services and Amazon.com Inc (Amazon), a US-based online retailer and web service provider, may acquire AudioBoom Group PLC, a UK-based on-demand audio and podcasting distribution platform.

(Republication or redistribution, including by framing or similar means, is expressly prohibited without prior written consent. Marketline shall not be liable for errors or delays in the content, or for any actions taken in reliance thereon.)

Deal StatusRumour: 2022-02-14

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Audioboom Group plc
Acquirer 1 (Company)Amazon.com, Inc.
Acquirer 2 (Company)Spotify Technology SARL

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition100%
